title: League wont open 2018
body: The Game wont open at all i tried everything reinstall repair tool but cant seem to find a solution

replies.body: I may be able to help!  Give your PC a restart just in case something crashed in the background.  Otherwise a security setting could be blocking the patcher from launching.  Running as admin could help, but double check antivirus or OS settings that might be acting a bit overzealous.

i need help, same problem to me, i tried everything even turning off my antivirus
{{champion:32}}
